name: AVEEAVAXRecLev
description: Aave strategy for AVAX. No need to _enterMarket() as LendingPool already defaults collateral to true. See https://github.com/aave/protocol-v2/blob/master/contracts/protocol/lendingpool/LendingPool.sol#L123-L126.

eventDecorators.name: AllowDepositor
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

eventDecorators.name: Deposit
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

eventDecorators.name: DepositsEnabled
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

eventDecorators.name: Recovered
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

eventDecorators.name: Reinvest
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

eventDecorators.name: RemoveDepositor
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

eventDecorators.name: UpdateAdminFee
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

eventDecorators.name: UpdateDevAddr
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

eventDecorators.name: UpdateDevFee
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

eventDecorators.name: UpdateMaxTokensToDepositWithoutReinvest
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

eventDecorators.name: UpdateMinTokensToReinvest
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

eventDecorators.name: UpdateReinvestReward
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

eventDecorators.name: Withdraw
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

functionDecorators.name: allowDepositor
functionDecorators.description: Add an allowed depositor.

functionDecorators.name: checkReward
functionDecorators.description: Reward tokens avialable to strategy, including balance.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Deposit and deploy deposits tokens to the strategy. Must mint receipt tokens to `msg.sender`.

functionDecorators.name: depositFor
functionDecorators.description: Deposit on behalf of another account. Must mint receipt tokens to `account`.

functionDecorators.name: depositWithPermit
functionDecorators.description: Deposit using Permit. Should revert for tokens without Permit.

parameterDecorators.name: deadline
parameterDecorators.description: The time at which to expire the signature.

parameterDecorators.name: v
parameterDecorators.description: The recovery byte of the signature.

parameterDecorators.name: r
parameterDecorators.description: Half of the ECDSA signature pair.

parameterDecorators.name: s
parameterDecorators.description: Half of the ECDSA signature pair.

functionDecorators.name: estimateDeployedBalance
functionDecorators.description: Estimated deposit token balance deployed by strategy, excluding balance.

functionDecorators.name: estimateReinvestReward
functionDecorators.description: Estimate reinvest reward.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: recoverAVAX
functionDecorators.description: Recover AVAX from contract.

functionDecorators.name: recoverERC20
functionDecorators.description: Recover ERC20 from contract.

functionDecorators.name: reinvest
functionDecorators.description: Reinvest reward tokens into deposit tokens.

functionDecorators.name: removeDepositor
functionDecorators.description: Remove an allowed depositor.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: rescueDeployedFunds
functionDecorators.description: Rescue all available deployed deposit tokens back to Strategy.

functionDecorators.name: revokeAllowance
functionDecorators.description: Revoke token allowance.

functionDecorators.name: setAllowances
functionDecorators.description: Approve tokens for use in Strategy. Should use modifier `onlyOwner` to avoid griefing.

functionDecorators.name: totalDeposits
functionDecorators.description: This function returns a snapshot of last available quotes.

returnDecorators.description: total deposits available on the contract.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: updateAdminFee
functionDecorators.description: Update admin fee.

functionDecorators.name: updateDepositsEnabled
functionDecorators.description: Enable/disable deposits.

functionDecorators.name: updateDevAddr
functionDecorators.description: Update devAddr.

functionDecorators.name: updateDevFee
functionDecorators.description: Update developer fee.

functionDecorators.name: updateMaxTokensToDepositWithoutReinvest
functionDecorators.description: Update reinvest max threshold before a deposit.

functionDecorators.name: updateMinTokensToReinvest
functionDecorators.description: Update reinvest min threshold.

functionDecorators.name: updateReinvestReward
functionDecorators.description: Update reinvest reward.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Redeem receipt tokens for deposit tokens.
